definition: to pay respects/to wish good health/in Qing times, a specific form of salutation (see also 打千[da3 qian1])
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An

sentences.english: On the second day in early morning, three madams accompany square the madam come to give too madam to send greeting.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一大早，三夫人陪着方夫人來給太夫人請安。

sentences.english: Please allocate a long bed for me.
Please install this software to the Device Memory.
sentences.chinese: 請安裝本軟體至手機主記憶體位置。

sentences.english: Please be quiet while I figure out the correct amount.
sentences.chinese: 我在計算出正確數額的當兒，請安靜一點。

sentences.english: To run the examples in this article, install the sample database.
sentences.chinese: 如欲運行本文中介紹的示例，請安裝樣本數據庫。
請安排一位會說日語之人。

sentences.english: Install this package if you need further information on the development process and workings of Aspell.
sentences.chinese: 如需更多信息，請安裝這個軟件包。

sentences.english: Father, Theodule is coming to present his respects to you this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親，今天早晨忒阿杜勒要來向您請安。

sentences.english: Please arrange for shipment by nest available steamer.
sentences.chinese: 請安排隊下一班可訂到艙位的輪船裝運。

sentences.english: Please arrange an ambulance while the ship arrives.
‘Be quiet, please, and sit down, ’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: “請安靜，坐下，”沃爾什探長說，看着傑基。

sentences.english: Ok, see the redlight? Quiet, please.
Greet them in the morning to show them that you care.
sentences.chinese: 早上要跟父母請安表示你的關心。
請安排一名會說日語的人。

sentences.english: The aircraft need defuelling . Would you please arrange a defuelling-cart ?
sentences.chinese: 飛機需要抽油，請安排一輛抽油車。

sentences.english: Please arrange to cover the consignment against A. R.
sentences.chinese: 請安排爲這批貨物投一切險。

definition: to propose marriage
wife of father's younger brother/aunt
to cause trouble for sb/to inconvenience
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
(coll.) old man/(said of an aging husband) my old man
to apologize
cheerful and optimistic/in a good mood/gaily
affectionate/intimate/warmhearted/to get intimate with sb
attitude/position (on an issue etc)
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to have no sense of shame
imaginative/to have one's mind buzzing with ideas
to reply
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
to reprimand/to rebuke/to berate/stern criticism
shopkeeper
